original_text: Then the boundary continued south to the Kanah Ravine. There were towns belonging to Ephraim lying among the towns of Manasseh, but the boundary of Manasseh was the northern side of the ravine and ended at the Mediterranean Sea.
korean_text: 또 그 경계가 가나 시내로 내려가서 그 시내 남쪽에 이르나니 므낫세의 성읍 중에 이 성읍들은 에브라임에게 속하였으며 므낫세의 경계는 그 시내 북쪽이요 그 끝은 바다이며

sentences.original_text: Then the boundary continued south to the Kanah Ravine.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 경계는 가나 협곡까지 남쪽으로 이어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: There were towns belonging to Ephraim lying among the towns of Manasseh,
sentences.korean_translation: 에브라임에 속한 도시들이 므낫세 도시들 사이에 있었고,

sentences.original_text: but the boundary of Manasseh was the northern side of the ravine
and ended at the Mediterranean Sea.
